description: Pun with 'palm' as a play on words.
title: Handy Tree
n_1: Jake and Liz are sitting in a park, talking.
c1_1: Hey Liz, what kind of tree fits in your hand?
n_2: Jake smiles, ready to reveal the joke.
n_3: Liz laughs while Jake looks proud of his joke.
c1_3: I thought you’d like that one.
c2_3: You always have the best puns.
n_4: They both laugh together, enjoying the moment.
c1_4: Wait till you hear my next one!
